name: c3
description: Common Cloud Core a Sails application

scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && echo 'Done.'
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint . --max-warnings=0 && echo 'âœ”  Your code looks good.'
scripts.deploy: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-dev.yaml c3Dev
scripts.deploy-test: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-test.yaml c3Test
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-prod.yaml c3

author: Darren Pulsipher
